walkthrough: Click 'Login | Register'
Click on 'Student Portal'
Register with your IITH email ID
Fill in your details correctly and save. You can reset to original information too
Select Academic Details
Fill in your information regarding your schooling, JEE, current degree at IITH and Degrees prior to IITH
Select Master CV
Enter your detials for your master CV. Please note that your master CV will be verified and only then you can register to companies. So enter your information correctly
Fill your details for each field individually by selecting them
Save the results to your master CV. You can view the preview of your master CV before saving your information
You can download and print your CV
You will get a mail regarding the deadline to submit your master CV
If there is any information that you submitted is incorrect, your master CV will be flagged and you will recieve an email regarding the same
You will get a notification when your master CV has been verified. Now you can view all the available listings in the campus
Click on Manage Documents
Under Manage Documents, you can create individual CV for each listing
Add a name to your CV
You can see that a new CV has been created. Click on it to edit your CV
Add only those fields from master CV which are relevant to the listing you are applying.
You can rearrange the fields in the order you wish on your CV. Click on save to edit the CV. You can look the preview of the CV before editing.
You can Download the CV now
Whenever there is a new listing in the college, you will get an email regarding it
Go to 'Companies on Campus'
You will see all the listings available in the campus. Check your eligibility and register to a company before the deadline
Check all the details of the listing and register to the company
Select the appropriate CV for the listing from the CVs you have created
If you have registered successfully, you will see 'You are registered' under the status of registration
If a company shortlists you, you will see that the status of registration is updated to 'You are shortlisted'
When your interview slot is decided, you will receive such email. Open the listing to check your slot timing and venue
Your slot timing and venue are shown here
Before your interview slot commences, you will receive an email about your interview list
Your interview list is the list of students you are going to interview. Download the sheet
You will have a list of students and their contacts. This is your interview list. You need to interview them
After all the interviews, you will have to make a list of selected candidates and waitlist candidates
Making selected list is the same process as making shortlist
You need to upload it
You can also upload 'Waitlist'. It is not mandatory, but highly recommended. Click the 'X' button if the waitlist is empty
Your status is now updated. You will need to wait till the finalized list is made. You will be emailed when its done
gettingStarted: Fill in the details appropriately and click 'Register'
You will have received an email in your registered email ID for email verification
Click the button 'Verify Now' to verify your email
If successful, you can now login to your newly created account
Enter your credentials and login to the portal
You will need to create a new listing now
Whenever your student coordinator is alloted, you will be notified via email and you can look at their details in the homepage
For creating a new listing, you need to fill out this form containing all the details
Select all the degrees/programmes you would like to hire from
You need to set options for every degree
Enter the details, some textfields are multiline
Check twice before creating, once you are sure, hit 'Create'
If successful, you will see a list of all of your listings. Click on the listing's title to open it

The current status of the listing is displayed on the top right corner. All your details you entered are visible down below. The first stage of status is 'Registration'. It means that students are registering for your listing
